steps.name: Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/
Disable cookies
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Recip-eeYVb@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Recip-eeYVb
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Verify that the email message is correct
Verify that the recipient's first name in the email is AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Recip-eeYVb
Verify that the recipient's last name in the email is 02343
Verify that the custom msg in the email is PCoJPfwShl
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Send-eeYVb
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/organization/invite?token=66d2b7e2ccd646df39a802449306a7285aff562bua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Send-eeYVb 52192
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Send-eeYVb
Click "Accept"
Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Send-eeYVb 52192
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-LwfLt-750-U-Recip-eeYVb 02343
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
